title: Why is Russia's Covid-19 mortality rate so low?
description: For almost two weeks, three countries have led the rest of the world in the daily number of new Covid-19 infections: The United States, Russia and Brazil.

title: Trump criticizes Fauci advice: 'It's not an acceptable answer'
description: President Donald Trump says infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci wants to "play all sides of the equation" when it comes to reopening schools.

title: Fox News hosts target Fauci
description: After Dr. Anthony Fauci's Senate testimony, where he said the US doesn't have complete control over the coronavirus pandemic, Fox News hosts criticized him. CNN's Jim Acosta reports.

title: Thousands of people want to be exposed to Covid-19 for science
description: Infecting volunteers with Covid-19 could cut a vaccine study by months. CNN's Drew Griffin reports

title: Doctor explains how to spot Covid-related syndrome in children
description: The CDC is warning doctors to look out a mysterious illness in children that could be linked to the coronavirus. CNN's Brianna Keilar speaks to a doctor about the symptoms and how to spot any red flags.

title: Watch this NASA rover-inspired robot navigate tricky terrain
description: The "Mini Rover," a scaled down, 3D-printed model of a NASA rover concept was developed by researchers at Georgia Tech.
